name: Cruise Elroy
description:
Somewhere between twenty and a hundred years ago, the original Pac-Man arrived in arcades in the United States. As a very small child I saw the arcade machine in a university cafeteria and it set me on a life-long path of loving video games and, eventually, making them for a living. (That might or might not be a good thing in the long run, but either way I'm stuck with it now.) At any rate, I've made a tribute to one of the greatest games ever made. Please enjoy Cruise Elroy!

Gameplay features:

  • Gameplay, AI, graphics, and sound shockingly similar to the original arcade game.
  • 21 different mazes to play through, including mazes based on spinoff games and bootlegs and four original stages.
  • Remix mode plays with randomized stages and fruit.
  • Timed modes challenge you to get as far as you can with unlimited lives.
  • Adjust difficulty levels and play as Ms. Pac-Man.
  • Is there a kill screen? Yes, of course there's a kill screen.
  • Create your own stages easily by modding the game's files.

It's a good time. You should try it!
